parameters.name: maxtemp
parameters.description: Over temperature protection. Board shutsdown if the core temperature gets above this value. Setting this parameter below 50 disables the feature

parameters.name: pwrdwn_delay
parameters.description: Number of seconds that the delayed power-off in the EPS is set to so Linux has time to shutdown

parameters.name: cmd_pwroff
parameters.description: Set to '1' to start a soft shutdown of the board. This value will be set to '2' by the monitor once the shutdown has been initiated. If `eps_type`, `eps_node`, and `pwrdwn_delay` has been configured, a delayed off command will be sent to the EPS

parameters.name: usb_ena
parameters.description: Enable the USB phy so USB ethernet can be used

parameters.name: csp_rtable
parameters.description: CSP routing table in the CIDR format: See GOSH manual for further details

parameters.name: csp_addr
parameters.description: CSP address of the Z7000 Monitor

parameters.name: init_ad9361
parameters.description: If set to true the monitor will place all TR600s in sleep mode after boot

parameters.name: bootok_node
parameters.description: The monitor will try to ping this CSP node and if it gets an response it will set the boot ok flag

parameters.name: powerchan
parameters.description: The power channel that the board is powered from. This is used to power off the board in an over temperature event, or a soft shutdown.

parameters.name: eps_node
parameters.description: EPS csp address. Used to send power-off command to the EPS, -1 disables the feature

parameters.name: kissdevice
parameters.description: UART device to use for CSP/KISS connection

parameters.name: last-time
parameters.description: Unix time stamp for last event

parameters.name: last-pa
parameters.description: Physical frame address of last error

parameters.name: last-la
parameters.description: Linear frame address of last error

parameters.name: last-wd
parameters.description: Word in frame location of last error

parameters.name: last-bt
parameters.description: Bit in word location of last error

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: SEM core state: UNKNOWN=-1, IDLE=0, INIT=1, OBS=2, CORR=4, CLASS=8, INJECT=16, ERROR=31

parameters.name: coretemp
parameters.description: Core temperature of the Z7000 SoC in tenths of degrees celcius

parameters.name: softadctemp
parameters.description: Temperature of the Z7000 daughterboard ADC in tenths of degrees celcius

parameters.name: femtemp
parameters.description: Temperature of FEM (Front End Module: TR600) in tenths of degrees celcius

parameters.name: femadctemp
parameters.description: Temperature of FEM ADC in tenths of degrees celcius

parameters.name: corevcc
parameters.description: PL Internal core logic voltage. Nominal 1V

parameters.name: vccaux
parameters.description: PL I/O buffer pre-driver voltage. Nominal 1.8V

parameters.name: vccpint
parameters.description: PS Internal core logic voltage. Nominal 1V

parameters.name: vccpaux
parameters.description: PS I/O buffer pre-driver voltage. Nominal 1.8V

parameters.name: loads
parameters.description: 15 min, 5 min, and 1 min load average. Divide by 65536 to get value as reported by i.e. top or uptime
